description:
Show your cross-country skis some love.

  • Aluminum tip and tail forms fit the profile of a ski and are adjustable by sliding forward and backward in the table
  • Same profile in front and back
  • Mounts with clamps (available separately) to a waxing table
  • Fits skis from 150cm to 210cm
name: Swix XC Waxing Profile (Aluminum)
